response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, we are extending this offer to you at a special price of $1,200,000. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. We are more than happy to provide detailed specifications, testimonials, or even arrange a demonstration to showcase its capabilities.

Looking forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
